A: Type
f: A -> nat
============================
forall a b1 : btree A, le_sum a b1 = true -> sum_order a b1

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
sum_order = fun x y : btree A => sum_leaves x <= sum_leaves y : btree A -> btree A -> Prop
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
le_sum = fun x y : btree A => le_bool (sum_leaves x) (sum_leaves y) : btree A -> btree A -> bool
le_bool = fix le_bool (a b : nat) {struct b} : bool := match a with | 0 => true | S a1 => match b with | 0 => false | S b1 => le_bool a1 b1 end end : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments le_bool (_ _)%nat_scope
bool_eq_ok : forall b1 b2 : bool, bool_eq b1 b2 = true -> b1 = b2
inb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a p : btree A, {inb a p} + {~ inb a p}
distinct_leaves_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a : btree A, {distinct_leaves a} + {~ distinct_leaves a}
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
btree_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> Type), (forall a : A, P (leaf a)) -> (forall b : btree A, P b -> forall b0 : btree A, P b0 -> P (node b b0)) -> forall b : btree A, P b
btree_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> SProp), (forall a : A, P (leaf a)) -> (forall b : btree A, P b -> forall b0 : btree A, P b0 -> P (node b b0)) -> forall b : btree A, P b
btree_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (leaf a)) -> (forall b : btree A, P b -> forall b0 : btree A, P b0 -> P (node b b0)) -> forall b : btree A, P b
btree_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> Set), (forall a : A, P (leaf a)) -> (forall b : btree A, P b -> forall b0 : btree A, P b0 -> P (node b b0)) -> forall b : btree A, P b
in_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (l : list A), In b (map f l) -> exists a : A, In a l /\ b = f a
Nat.log2_bits_unique : forall a n : nat, Nat.testbit a n = true -> (forall m : nat, n < m -> Nat.testbit a m = false) -> Nat.log2 a = n
in_alphabet_compute_code : forall (A : Type) (m : list A) (t : btree A), (forall a : A, In a m -> inb (leaf a) t) -> in_alphabet m (compute_code t)
Nat.bit_log2 : forall a : nat, a <> 0 -> Nat.testbit a (Nat.log2 a) = true
le_bool_correct3 : forall a b : nat, le_bool a b = true -> a <= b
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
ulist_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), ulist l1 -> ulist l2 -> (forall a : A, In a l1 -> In a l2 -> False) -> ulist (l1 ++ l2)
bool_eq = fun b1 b2 : bool => if b1 then b2 else negb b2 : bool -> bool -> bool Arguments bool_eq (_ _)%bool_scope
unique_key_map : forall (A B C D : Type) (l : list (A * B)) (f : A * B -> C * D), unique_key l -> (forall a b : A * B, fst (f a) = fst (f b) -> fst a = fst b) -> unique_key (map f l)
Nat.bits_above_log2 : forall a n : nat, Nat.log2 a < n -> Nat.testbit a n = false
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat |- Type] ?B : [A : Type f : A -> nat |- Type]
Contradict3 : forall a : Prop, a -> ~ ~ a
Contradict1 : forall a b : Prop, b -> (a -> ~ b) -> ~ a
inb_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
inb_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
ulist_app_inv : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), ulist (l1 ++ l2) -> In a l1 -> In a l2 -> False
in_or_app : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m)
in_app_or : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ m) -> In a l \/ In a m
all_leaves_in : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A), inb (leaf a) t -> In a (all_leaves t)
all_leaves_inb : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A), In a (all_leaves t) -> inb (leaf a) t
